skills.title: Data Engineering and Pipeline Management
skills.description: Expertise in designing and implementing data pipelines and ETL processes with various databases (PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Oracle, MSSQL, Adabas).

skills.title: Machine Learning and Data Analytics
skills.description: Experience in training and implementing machine learning models for classification and prediction, as well as creating dashboards and automating reports.

skills.title: Programming and Automation
skills.description: Strong proficiency in Python for various purposes including report automation, A/B testing automation, data manipulation, and pipeline failure identification.

skills.title: Team Leadership and Mentorship
skills.description: Experience in onboarding and mentoring new data engineering team members, as well as building strong customer relationships.
